Sentencas: Sr-doped lanthanum cuprate was recently investigated as a potential cathode material for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell using yittria-stabilized zirconia as an electrolyte.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The material thermal stability of cathode material against an electrolyte at an operating temperature plays an important role in the fuel cell's performance.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: In this study, the structural stability between Sr-doped lanthanum cuprate and 8 mol% yittria-stabilized zirconia was investigated by using the powder mixture and diffusion couple.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The chemical reaction between these two materials in the temperature ranging from 800 degrees to 1000 degrees C was examined by X-ray diffraction analyses.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The interfacial reaction behavior between electrode and electrolyte pellets of the reaction couple was examined by a grazing X-ray diffractometer, wavelength-dispersive X-ray analysis, and an electron probe microanalyzer.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: No reaction products were observed as these two materials co-fired at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The reaction products of pyrochlore La2Zr2O7 and perovskite SrZrO3 were formed when the specimens were heat treated at over 900 degrees C. Because of the formation of these reaction products, the CuO was precipitated.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Furthermore, an excess of SrZrO3 formation leads to the phase decomposition of perovskite Sr-doped lanthanum cuprate to La2-xSrxCuO4 and CuO due to a decrease in strontium concentration in Sr-doped lanthanum cuprate.
Titulo: Reaction between strontium-doped lanthanum cuprate and yittria-stabilized zirconia
